content.prompt_es: Reescribe la frase usando la palabra clave 'SISTER':
content.explanation: El uso de 'too' muestra la elipsis de la parte repetida de la oración.
content.stimulus_en:
She enjoys gardening, and so does her sister.

Her sister enjoys gardening too. ...

content.prompt_es: Reescribe la frase usando la palabra clave 'I':
content.explanation: Se omite la repetición del sujeto y el verbo en la nueva oración.
content.stimulus_en:
John can play the piano, and I can play the piano as well.

I can play the piano too. ...
content.correct_answer: I can play the piano too.

content.prompt_es: Reescribe la frase usando la palabra clave 'SARAH':
content.explanation: Se omite la répétition de 'to the conference' usando 'as well'.
content.stimulus_en:
Michael is going to the conference; Sarah is going to the conference too.

Sarah is going as well. ...

content.prompt_es: Reescribe la frase usando la palabra clave 'SISTER':
content.explanation: Se omite la repetición de 'coffee' usando 'it'.
content.stimulus_en:
I don't like coffee. My sister does not like coffee either.

My sister doesn't like it either. ...
content.correct_answer: My sister doesn't like it either.

content.prompt_es: Reescribe la frase usando la palabra clave 'TEAM':
content.explanation: Se utiliza 'did so' para sustituir la frase previa, mostrando elipsis.
content.stimulus_en:
The manager approved the proposal, and the team approved the proposal.

The team did so. ...

content.prompt_es: Fill in the blanks with the correct words from the options provided.
content.main_text: In order to conduct effective (1)[GAP 1] in a university setting, it is crucial to understand the underlying (2)[GAP 2] that guide academic inquiry. The process involves a thorough (3)[GAP 3] of existing literature, enabling researchers to identify gaps in knowledge. Furthermore, the presentation of findings must adhere to (4)[GAP 4] standards, ensuring the work is credible and trustworthy. Ultimately, the goal is to contribute valuable (5)[GAP 5] to the field of study.
content.explanation:
(1) En este contexto, 'study' se refiere al acto de investigar en un entorno académico.
(2) Aquí, 'theory' es un sustantivo singular que se refiere a un marco conceptual que guía la investigación.
(3) 'Analysis' es un sustantivo que indica el proceso de examinar datos o textos en profundidad.
(4) 'Academic' se refiere a estándares que son aceptados y utilizados en un entorno educativo.
(5) 'Knowledge' es un sustantivo que representa la comprensión y la información obtenida a través de la investigación.
